definition_en: A type of nuclear reactor that uses ordinary water, as opposed to heavy water, as both its coolant and neutron moderator.
definition_ko: 중수가 아닌 일반 물을 냉각재와 중성자 감속재로 사용하는 원자로의 한 종류.

slots.context_ko: Effects of LWR Coolant Environments on Fatigue Design Curves of Austenitic Stainless Steels
